item.description:
If you do not have plans on Christmas day, now you do! Or, maybe your plans are earlier or later and you can still join us.

First we'll see an afternoon Movie (It's Complicated) at the Westboro Cinema at 2:00 pm.

Then we'll head on over to the wonderful Chinese restaurant, "Cheng Du" on Route 9 in Westboro for an early dinner.

If you prefer to do just the movie or just the dinner, that is perfectly fine. Please sign up for one or both events separately. To RSVP for the movie too, click here: http://www.meetup.com...

It's going to be a fun day. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Jacki or the meetup group, or just look for us.
item.name: Chinese Dinner at Cheng Du Westboro
